export var ADD_TO_WISHLIST="ADD_TO_WISHLIST";export var DELETE_FROM_WISHLIST="DELETE_FROM_WISHLIST";export var DELETE_ALL_FROM_WISHLIST="DELETE_ALL_FROM_WISHLIST";// add to wishlist
export var addToWishlist=function addToWishlist(item,addToast){return function(dispatch){if(addToast){addToast("Added To Wishlist",{appearance:"success",autoDismiss:true});}dispatch({type:ADD_TO_WISHLIST,payload:item});};};// delete from wishlist
export var deleteFromWishlist=function deleteFromWishlist(item,addToast){return function(dispatch){if(addToast){addToast("Eliminado",{appearance:"error",autoDismiss:true});}dispatch({type:DELETE_FROM_WISHLIST,payload:item});};};//delete all from wishlist
export var deleteAllFromWishlist=function deleteAllFromWishlist(addToast){return function(dispatch){if(addToast){addToast("Se elimino todo",{appearance:"error",autoDismiss:true});}dispatch({type:DELETE_ALL_FROM_WISHLIST});};};
